item.title: By: Richard K Miller
item.dc:creator: Richard K Miller
item.description: Thanks, Joseph. I look forward to when the themes are also available by Subversion.
item.content:encoded: Thanks, Joseph. I look forward to when the themes are also available by Subversion.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Richard -
There is a back end Subversion repository for the themes, but currently we're focusing on providing the themes as zip files.
item.content:encoded:
@Richard –

There is a back end Subversion repository for the themes, but currently we’re focusing on providing the themes as zip files.

item.title: By: Richard K Miller
item.dc:creator: Richard K Miller
item.description: Joseph, are these themes available for download via Subversion, or is that coming in a future release?
item.content:encoded: Joseph, are these themes available for download via Subversion, or is that coming in a future release?

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.content:encoded:
@Josh –

We’re leaving that up for now for those who still want/need access to those files.

UPDATE: http://themes.wordpress.net/ is now redirecting to http://wordpress.org/extend/themes/

item.title: By: Josh
item.dc:creator: Josh
item.description:
Good job, worth the wait.
By the way, shouldn't http://themes.wordpress.net/ now redirect to the new site?
item.content:encoded:
Good job, worth the wait.

By the way, shouldn’t http://themes.wordpress.net/ now redirect to the new site?

item.title: By: Benedict Eastaugh
item.dc:creator: Benedict Eastaugh
item.description: Just wanted to say thank you, and well done; I think you've done a superb job on this.
item.content:encoded: Just wanted to say thank you, and well done; I think you’ve done a superb job on this.

item.title: By: Novo Diretório de Temas para Wordpress - Wordpressbr.com
